name: Todoist Wide & Narrow
description: Makes the Todoist website wider (less horizontal white space) & task/project lines narrower (less vertical white space). There's a bookmarklet code added at the top of the code if you want to use this style only occassionally (for example for printing). If you're using the DARK THEME, please choose it under the settings!
additional_info: I'm not a coder (complete amateur) and this is my first time posting anything code-related. If you find bugs, feel free to let me know, but I can't promise I'll be able to fix them on my own. Credit for the beginning of the code (wider content and wider left menu) goes to coder-in-me (for his style Wider Todoist). I fixed the jumps in his code between the Today/Inbox and Next 7 Days views (it was the hovering scrollbar that was causing the problem). Update 1.0 (10 March 2020): The 9th March Todoist update changed something in regards to the vertical narrow space, which caused it to be wide again. I hope I fixed it.
